name: agentc-ai-developer
description: Brief Minimo methodology with integrated microprocessos: /brief (Microprocesso 1.1) → /setup-local-observability (Microprocesso 1.2) → /spike-agentic (Microprocesso 1.3) → /backlog (incremental development with prioritization scores and issue tracking) → /analyz-slices (S2.1 validation) → /iniciar-slice (S2.2 dev start) → /novo-incremento (S2.2 incremental loop) → /finalizar-incremento (S2.2 validation loop). Eight commands with gates validation, metrics tracking, coverage validation (≥70%), regression detection, and automatic decision logic. help-assistant agent with PROACTIVE MCP integration - automatically fetches LangChain/LangGraph docs when analyzing code or answering questions. spike-agentic and microprocesso-1-2 skills for progressive disclosure. Agentic loop validation, architecture exploration, LangGraph patterns. Full incremental development workflow with metrics validation. MCP integration for LangChain/LangGraph docs via langchain-docs server.
